title: Fellini → Renzi caricature
inscription: Handwritten text: 'Cosa aspetta Federico a fare la rivolussione?'
creator: "Renzo Renzi"
current_location: Renzo Renzi Library, Cineteca di Bologna
description: Hand-drawn caricature by Renzo Renzi portraying Federico Fellini, later used as a visual identity for the Cineteca di Bologna.
notes: Central visual reference for the project title *The “Revolussion” of Renzo Renzi*.
